entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts school. He is shocked that Draco invited Greyback into the school.

entities.name: draco
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts and a friend of Malfoy. He invited Greyback into the school.

entities.name: greyback
entities.description: A Death Eater who is invited to Hogwarts by Draco. He has a cannibalistic nature and enjoys ripping out throats.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is disgusted by Greyback's presence in the school.
Draco invited Greyback into the school.
